page.title: 13PUBLIC OPINION
page.content: Local councillors,governors of our school,tell of the several projects they get involved with and local public opinion. -People in Westerleigh are worried about the{busy traffic}and would like to see a stricter speed limit imposed. -There is a{lack of cheaper housing and young people tend to move out of the area when they get married. -Local people support the churches and a{council grant}of Â£10,000 was given to renovate the roof of St.Peter's, Wapley. -Against public opinion,Westerleigh {village school closed}recently. The silly thing is that some new houses are now being built and numbers of children may increase again.The old schoolhouse has been bought privately and is being turned into a nursery school.
